docs.snippet: A former volunteer coach whose house was the scene of an underage drinking party before the 2012 rape of a girl by two high school football players plans to plead no contest to charges connected to the case, law enforcement officials said Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former volunteer coach whose house was the scene of an underage drinking party before the 2012 rape of a girl by two high school football players plans to plead no contest to charges connected to the case, law enforcement officials said Monday.

headline.main: No Contest Plea Expected in Football Rape Case

docs.lead_paragraph: Florida State's Jameis Winston had a slower seven days after a busy previous week that included the spring football game. The Heisman winner played in just two of four games, but did throw a career-high 4.2 innings while earning his first win of the season during the weekend.

headline.main: Heisman Winner Winston Earns First Win of Season

docs.snippet: Ray Emery had a major operation for a degenerative hip condition four years ago and said, “I want to make the most of it,” every time he took the ice....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ray Emery had a major operation for a degenerative hip condition four years ago and said, “I want to make the most of it,” every time he took the ice.
docs.abstract: Philadelphia Flyers backup goaltender Ray Emery, who underwent surgery for a degenerative hip condition in 2010, helps team forge a 4-2 playoff victory against New York Rangers; victory breaks nine-game losing streak for the Flyers at Madison Square Garden and is Emery's first playoff victory in three years.

headline.main: Flyers’ Backup Goalie Is Used to Facing Tough Battles
headline.print_headline: Flyers’ Backup Goalie Is Used to Facing Tough Challenges
